description: User asks to add a new technology blog RSS feed; the assistant validates the URL by fetching recent items, reviews the fetched articles, and confirms that the feed has been added to the subscriber's list.

messages.content: You are the AI assistant for a Personalized News Digest service. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarize articles, rank them, send email digests, and update user interest profiles. Use the provided tools when needed and always keep the user informed of your actions.
Hi! I'd like to add the TechCrunch RSS feed to my daily news digest. The URL is https://techcrunch.com/feed/. Can you set that up for me?
Sure, let me verify the feed by fetching the latest entries. One moment…

[{"title": "AI startup raises $50M Series B funding", "link": "https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/06/ai-startup-raises-50m-series-b", "publish_date": "2025-12-06T08:30:00Z"}, {"title": "Quantum computing breakthrough promises faster simulations", "link": "https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/05/quantum-computing-breakthrough", "publish_date": "2025-12-05T14:12:00Z"}, {"title": "New iPhone announced with satellite connectivity", "link": "https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/04/apple-iphone-satellite", "publish_date": "2025-12-04T10:45:00Z"}, {"title": "Google unveils AI-powered search updates", "link": "https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/03/google-ai-search", "publish_date": "2025-12-03T09:20:00Z"}, {"title": "Microsoft acquires cybersecurity firm Sentinel", "link": "https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/02/microsoft-sentinel-acquisition", "publish_date": "2025-12-02T16:05:00Z"}]

The feed looks good! I fetched the five most recent articles from TechCrunch, and they all loaded successfully. I've added the TechCrunch RSS feed to your subscription list. Going forward, relevant TechCrunch articles will be included in your daily digest, ranked according to your interests.

If you'd like to see a preview of what the next digest might contain, just let me know!
